summary: Adds NEW models and textures for vanilla Dragon Claws. Comes in 1k, 2k and 4k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/91r8Y9d.png[/img][/url][/center][center][youtube]A_BvweOYg7o[/youtube] [youtube]VacWgUp5Dvo[/youtube][/center][center][/center]
[b]About:
[/b]
Around a year ago, I was playing Skyrim and noticed that the quality of Dragon Claws was quite shocking, so I started working on my own version. I decided to make them look more like actual Dragon Claws, with two variants; metal and gemstone. This mod was made a while back, just unreleased because I wasn't sure about it at the time.

I didn't make any edits to the Animal sigils displayed on each claw, so that aspect is kept vanilla (including textures). I recommend installing this over the top of other mods that edit Ruins Clutter.

Appearance may vary based on ENB / non-ENB settings.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]New Models and Textures for Vanilla Dragon Claws.[/b]

[center][b][color=#ff0000]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/color][/b][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[b][color=#00ffff]Note:[/color][/b] As this is a loose archive, when asked to overwrite any existing files, [b][u]ALWAYS[/u][/b] select "yes".

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:

[/b]Q. Will this conflict with other mods that change the appearance of Dragon Claws?
A. Yes, so please make sure that you overwrite any files when prompted.

Q. I installed "X" mod and now the textures are messed up on the claws. How can I fix it?
A. Reinstall JS Dragon Claws and make sure to overwrite any files.

Q. Will you do any of the other Claws in-game?
A. Unfortunately no. I have to work on other projects.

Q. Why didn't you re-texture the animal sigils on the claws?
A. As they are very small, I felt it was unnecessary and other mods have done to a quality standard.

Q. What mods are you working on/got planned?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][b]facebook[/b][/url] page!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod! [b]Remember, modding is stressful and we do it for free![/b]

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]
[/url]Please check out my other mods!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72822/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/6hTry9d.png[/img]

files.name: 2k Textures
files.changelogHtml: Ivory Claw animal sigils had an incorrect shader property left over from Bethesda's old meshes. This made it invisible in-game. Corrected.

files.name: 1k Textures
